head.title: Reckson in Stock Swap With Stichting Funds

hedline.hl1: Reckson in Stock Swap With Stichting Funds

abstract.p: Reckson Associates Realty Corp of Melville, NY, issues 4,181,818 shares of Class A common stock in exchange for Stichting Pensionfonds Series B convertible cumulative preferred stock (S)

block.p: The Reckson Associates Realty Corporation in Melville (NYSE: RA), a real estate investment trust, announced an exchange of securities with Stichting Pensionfonds. Reckson issued 4,181,818 shares of Class A common stock in exchange for Series B convertible cumulative preferred stock with a liquidation preference of $100 million out of the company's $150 million outstanding.
